org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb
Class AeXMLDBObject

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.AeXMLDBObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeAbstractXMLDBStorage, AeXMLDBQueryBuilder
public abstract class AeXMLDBObject
extends java.lang.Object

A base object for all classes that need to look up XMLDB statements from the xmldb config object. This class also provides access to the data source.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String mConfigPrefix
          The config prefix configured for this object (optional).
private  IAeXMLDBStorageImpl mStorageImpl
          A xmldb storage impl to delegate db-specific operations to.
private  AeXMLDBConfig mXMLDBConfig
          The XMLDB config.
private static java.lang.ThreadLocal sCurrentStatementName
          A threadlocal variable to store the name of the current statement (for logging).

Gets a new XMLDB connection.

Parameters:
aAutoCommit - if false, caller must commit the transaction
Throws:
AeXMLDBException

getTransactionManagerConnection

protected IAeXMLDBConnection getTransactionManagerConnection(boolean aCommitControlOnFallback)
                                                      throws AeXMLDBException
Returns a connection from the transaction manager if the current thread is already participating in a transaction. Otherwise returns a either normal connection or commit control connection.

Parameters:
aCommitControlOnFallback - if true, returns a commit control connection if the thread is not part of a active transaction.
Throws:
AeXMLDBException

getTransaction

protected IAeTransaction getTransaction()
                                 throws AeXMLDBException
Convenience method to return transaction for current thread, translating AeTransactionException to AeXMLDBException.

Throws:
AeXMLDBException

resolveXQueryKey

protected java.lang.String resolveXQueryKey(java.lang.String aXQueryKey)
Resolves the given key to a real xmldb config key. If there is a prefix set on this object, then it is prepended to the given key. If no prefix is set, the key is left unchanged.

Parameters:
aXQueryKey -
